name: Picture Puzzle!
description:
Slide around the tiles until the picture is correct.

You can use help features such as
- Show the final result
- Show numbers on the tiles if you really cant see what its supposed to be.
- Stop timer!
- Show correct placement!

You can also send, request and receive lives from your invited friends. Just connect with Facebook!

-Get 10 Coins extra for sharing your result after each new completed level!

-Login with Facebook and use the same account on several devices!
